channel.title: M3DP News on Minimal 3DP
channel.description: Recent content in M3DP News on Minimal 3DP

item.title: New Minimal 3DP Website
item.description: Minimal 3DP YouTube Banner Photo: Mike Wilson / CC-BY-CA New Website With my previous website, I put it together with Wordpress. As what typically happens, WordPress was just too cumbersome for me to maintain. Additionally, it seemed like someone was always trying to hack it. It was a pain and I worried about the hacks. I have used Hugo in the past and I thought I would try to rewrite the site in it.
